These first two assignments that I've had so far have been perfect fits for my qualifications and temp work desires, and the pay has been reasonable for the type of work that I've been doing.

They also have done an excellent job of making themselves available to me to answer any questions that I may have, whether about their policies or about a specific assignment. They are always friendly and professional, and they maintain contact during assignments to verify that the assignment is a good fit for all parties involved.

I have had two temporary assignments so far: one as a switchboard operator, and the other as a courier. Both have been great fits for me. I have been primarily working with Sylinda so far, and she was the one to find those assignments for me. I highly recommend her.

I believe that if you exhibit professionalism and an eagerness to work, Snelling will work hard to find good work for you. Based on my experience, I feel 100% confident recommending Snelling, especially if you are looking for temporary administrative assignments.

text: very rude people that work there when I call over the phone, and I do not appreciate it. Won’t get my business again.

name: Cali Triplett
text: Elwood Staffing is by far the best Temp Force! Gave me the best and fast service. Thank you Miss Lisha Kidd for this opportunity!!

name: Ground Food
text:
A good way to get hired onto Honda. Or get your foot in the door without a special degree. Infact I think the only way. You have to spend way to much time to get hired onto Honda. Its excruciating. Honda is already strict. I have no problem with that. But a temp agency compared to that is too far. Getting less pay and worse benefits is fine. But they need more PTO and quicker attendance forgiveness. Also they need to give each person a pamlet evertime they update something and go over the best ways to not miss days. I was unaware of some because they didnt go over it at all or enough and it cost me two points instead of one. Also they(the elwood office) make mistakes just like anyone
But there mistakes can cost you your job or get you a piont. And they would never take the fall.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on your experience working at Honda. We will pass this along for coaching and training. We are perplexed on the mistake you reference. If you would like to speak to someone further about your experience, please reach out to our Associate Engagement team at 812.418.0962.

name: Sydney Ariel
text: Elwood is a great place to go. Very friendly and helpful staff! Mrs. Barnwell in particular was very helpful and professional to me over the phone.

name: Magic Shoota
text: Christy was very helpful for me with updating all my information and getting me a job the first time I went to apply for one. It was a good experience and very friendly environment. I highly recommend Elwood Staffing in Talladega and I Highly recommend Christy as a Rep to help you with all your info and getting you a job ASAP.

resp.text: Awe, thank you. We are glad you've had a good experience with us. Our team in Talladega is awesome. You are very fortunate to work with any of our recruiters.

name: Donna Bruce
text:
Crystal was fantastic. Very efficient and curtious. I could not have asked to have been treated with more respect.
The staff at my assignment however could use some improvement on thier communication skills. Things they told us were confusing and contradictory at times. Please note i am not speaking about the people in the local office. They were great.
I must say I am very appreciative.

resp.text: Donna, we appreciate your feedback. This is very useful information. We'll follow up with the local team to learn how we can better assist our associates and make the process easier. Thanks for sharing.

name: Tiarrial Duncan
text: Elwood Staffing is a great place to go if you’re looking for a job. Miss Christy and the staff is very helpful and they do a great job getting you set up for employment! If needed, I will be back.

text: I had the best experience at Elwood staffing with Christy. Thank you soooo much. You’re the best!

resp.text: Tatiyana- Thank you so very much for taking the time to give your feedback. We are thrilled you had a good experience. Please let us know if you have any questions we can answer for you.

name: Zac Nabors
text: I came up there this past Tuesday looking for employment and the staff at Talladega was the nicest, most driven people I think I've ever met, certainly the best staffing company around, in particular there is an employee named tarah who works there and she is great at what she does! She loves her job and certainly deserves a raise or possible promotion, if I find anyone looking for employment I will definitely refer y'all!

resp.text: Zac, Thank you for the kind review. We are so glad you stopped by our office and had the opportunity to meet with our staff. Let us know if there's anything we can do to be of further assistance to you.
